snippet: To say that the Red Bulls are lurching from one underachieving soccer area of Europe to another for their top management - the Scottish are replacing the Scandinavians - would be an understatement.
abstract: To say that the Red Bulls are lurching from one underachieving soccer area of Europe to another for their top management - the Scottish are replacing the Scandinavians - would be an understatement.

headline.main: Team in Transition Needs Some Direction
